xtiny-doc-page.name: Tools Menu
xtiny-doc-page.title: Jext : Tools Menu
xtiny-doc-page.paragraph: The Tools menu contains miscallenaous tools.

menu.title: Contents

submenu.title: Dawn
submenu.item: Executes the current text area content as a script.
Lets the user choose a file to run as a script.
Opens the scripting log window which keeps a trace of the latest executed scripts. It is very useful when you activate the Dawn server.

submenu.title: Python
submenu.item: Executes the current text area content as a Python script.
Lets the user choose a file to run as a Python script.
Opens the scripting log window which keeps a trace of the latest executed scripts. Please report to this window when an error occures.

menu.item: Zips (i.e. packs or compresses) the current document into a specified zip file. Be careful! If you specify an existing zip file, it will be overwritten. The document needs to be saved before being zipped: see Save As or Save.

Displays the Jext mail dialog. You need to enter your email address(ex: john.smith@yeah.gov), your SMTP server adress (ex: mail.yeah.gov) and the destination email. All these settings are saved for future sessions. When you're done with these settings, press Send and Jext will mail the contents of the active Jext window.
Triggers the split feature. When the text area is split, you are allowed to edit the same document in two text areas. Thus, you can read one part while editing another.
Triggers the left panel which contains by default the XTree and some plugins.
